Issue.creator: flyingtiger
Issue.summary: Could Fabric provide a method to query all the channels connected to the ordering service?
Issue.description: queryChannels(orderer) method, which is able to query all the channels' name of the target orderer. Here, the parameter orderer is a name representing the orderer node to which the channels' query request is sent. If this method is provided, the administrator of the ordering service could get all of the channel creations information and check whether a channel has been created. >
